name: Social Media Platform
description: An advanced social media platform inspired by Facebook, featuring robust user authentication, comprehensive profile management, posts, comments, likes, and real-time messaging.

name: Lung Image Classifier CNN
description: An advanced machine learning model developed to accurately sub-classify non-small cell lung cancer images into squamous cell carcinoma and adenocarcinoma, enhancing diagnostic precision for healthcare professionals.

name: Blog Site
description: A powerful Django-based application for creating, managing, and sharing blogs, providing users with an intuitive platform for content publishing and exploration.

name: DNA Promoter Classifier
description: A deep learning project utilizing a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to accurately classify DNA promoter sequences, enhancing our understanding of gene transcription and its implications for human diseases.

name: Snake Game
description: This is a simple Snake Game built using Java's javax.swing library. The game implements the classic snake gameplay, where the snake grows in length as it eats apples. The objective is to control the snake and prevent it from colliding with the walls or its own body.

name: X-Ray Image Diagnosis with ResNet Transfer Learning
description: This project leverages transfer learning with a pre-trained ResNet model to classify chest X-ray images into two categories, enhancing diagnostic capabilities in healthcare.

name: Traffic Sign Classification Using CNN
description: Developed a CNN model for classifying traffic signs into 43 categories using a dataset of over 50,000 images. Achieved 95% accuracy with a custom architecture and implemented an interactive GUI using Gradio.

name: Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for Image Generation
description: Implemented a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) using TensorFlow/Keras for generating images based on the MNIST dataset. The project showcases how high-dimensional data is represented in a latent space and used for generative tasks.
